title: Rubber in today's world
brief_description: Reviews the history of rubber from its discovery to its use today as a basic commodity, including primitive methods of manufacture, improvements through vulcanisation, and modern production and process from plantation to market. Shows sources of and major steps in the production of synthetic rubber.
